Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8

If this is just a place to define common patterns, then that makes a bit
more sense. If, however, this follows the WS-* scheme, then I must ask what
we didn't learn about WS-* that makes this seem like a good idea.


Ryan Riley
ryan.riley@...
http://panesofglass.org/
http://wizardsofsmart.net/
